name: 4K Bricks Breaker Plus
description:
Classic bricks breaker game enriched with weapons and much more. You can decide what will be added to game!

If you can't break a brick using your ball, you can shot them using a rifle, plasma gun, or burn down by laser.
To not make your play so easy, there are some obstacles waiting for you!

- 3 types of ball:
-- standard
-- spikeball (weaker, but dangerous against You)
-- fire-ball (destroy everything on the way, taking a little damage)
- 5 types of weapon:
-- short gun
-- machine gun
-- plasma gun
-- plasma machine gun
-- laser (low damage but ultra fire rate, fry them all)
- 100 levels in final version (soon)
- more atractions like flying enemies, fans, magnets, and more comming soon
